body_html:
Or maybe add an optional argument, e.g., candidate="jpg,bmp" to decode_image so that the possible image formats to be probed are restricted.

Either way, if the rank of the shape is determined then I can help creating a PR to have the shape defined when returned from decode_image.
body_text:
Or maybe add an optional argument, e.g., candidate="jpg,bmp" to decode_image so that the possible image formats to be probed are restricted.
Either way, if the rank of the shape is determined then I can help creating a PR to have the shape defined when returned from decode_image.
body:
Or maybe add an optional argument, e.g., `candidate="jpg,bmp"` to `decode_image` so that the possible image formats to be probed are restricted.

Either way, if the rank of the shape is determined then I can help creating a PR to have the shape defined when returned from `decode_image`.
